option.name: VM_PARAMETERS
option.value: -Xms1024m -Xmx4096m -Ddorg.diylc.debugAreaPerformance=true -Dorg.diylc.scriptRun=true -Dfile.encoding=UTF-8 --add-exports java.desktop/com.apple.eawt.event=ALL-UNNAMED --add-exports java.desktop/com.apple.eio=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.util=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.lang=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.base/java.text=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.desktop/java.awt=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.desktop/java.awt.font=ALL-UNNAMED --add-opens java.desktop/java.awt.geom=ALL-UNNAMED
